content:
Yes, some of these natural candle brands offer sampler sets or small sizes of their candles that you can try before committing to a full-size candle. Here are a few options to consider:

1. P.F. Candle Co. - offers a "Best Seller Mini Candle Set" that includes five 3.5oz candles, including their lavender scent. 2. Brooklyn Candle Studio - offers a "Discovery Set" that includes four 2oz candles, including one with a lavender scent. 3. Keap - offers a "Sample Set" that includes four 2oz candles, including their lavender-scented candle. 4. Boy Smells - offers a "Discovery Set" that includes six 3oz candles, including one with a lavender scent. 5. Lite+Cycle - offers a "Discovery Set" that includes three 2.5oz candles, including their lavender-scented candle. These sample sets are a great way to try a variety of scents from these brands without having to commit to a larger purchase.
